bioconda.name: macse
bioconda.summary: MACSE: Multiple Alignment of Coding SEquences Accounting for Frameshifts and Stop Codons.

biocontainers.name: macse
biocontainers.summary: Macse: multiple alignment of coding sequences accounting for frameshifts and stop codons.

biotools.summary:
Aligning Protein-Coding Nucleotide Sequences with MACSE.

MACSE: Multiple Alignment of Coding SEquences Accounting for Frameshifts and Stop Codons.

A wide range of molecular analyses relies on multiple sequence alignments (MSA).

MACSE aligns coding NT sequences with respect to their AA translation while allowing NT sequences to contain multiple frameshifts and or stop codons.
